类 Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    The server class implements a server instance able to connect with multiple clients and send data back and forth. If anything goes wrong with the connection, for example a client is not there or is listening on a different port, an exception is thrown.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      (专用程序包) class  Server.HandleSession
      The inner class implements a client requests handler including several threads.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private java.lang.String ACCEPTED
      The String replies to user that the username has not been used and is accpeted.
      private java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> clientNames
      The HashSet to store all the client names connected with the server, avoiding duplicates.
      private java.util.HashSet<java.io.PrintWriter> clientWriters
      The HashSet to store PrintWriters for each client program, avoiding duplicates.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> commands
      The commands available in the server program.
      private int connectedClientsNumber
      The number of current conncected clients.
      private int exceptionsNumber
      The number of Exceptions have occurred.
      private int MILLISECOND_TO_SECOND
      The ratio of converting from milliseconds to an second.
      private int PORT_NUMBER
      The port number is a way to identify a specific process to which an Internet or other network message is to be forwarded when it arrives at a server.
      private int SECOND_TO_HOUR
      The ratio of converting from seconds to an hour.
      private int SECOND_TO_MINUTE
      The ratio of converting from seconds to a minute.
      private int SERVER_WAITING_TIME
      The milliseconds of server waiting all clients to disconnect before its final broadcast.
      private java.io.BufferedReader serverReader
      The Buffer reader for the administrator to input command in the server program.
      private static long serverStartTime
      The starting time of the server.
      private java.net.ServerSocket ss
      A server socket waits for requests to come in over the network.
      private int totalClientsNumber
      The times of total conncetions built so far.
      private java.lang.String WELCOME
      The String asks client to input a username.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Server()
      Constructs a new Server with several commands.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      private java.lang.String getCurrentTime()
      Returns the current time in a customized format.
      private void handleAdministratorInput()
      Keeps receiving input from the keyboard from the administrator.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Starts the server programs.
      private void serverBroadcast(java.lang.String message)
      Boradcast the messages input by the server administrator.
      void shutDown()
      Shuts down the server and closes all connections meanwhile.
      (专用程序包) void start()
      Starts the server instance program.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • ss

        private java.net.ServerSocket ss
        A server socket waits for requests to come in over the network. It performs some operation based on that request, and then possibly returns a result to the requester.

        The Buffer reader for the administrator to input command in the server program.

    • 方法详细资料

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the server programs.
        参数:
        args - Arguments referenced by the format specifiers in the format string.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when running the server program

      • start

        void start()
    throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the server instance program.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when running the server program

      • handleAdministratorInput

        private void handleAdministratorInput()
        Keeps receiving input from the keyboard from the administrator.

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
        Shuts down the server and closes all connections meanwhile.

      • serverBroadcast

        private void serverBroadcast(java.lang.String message)
        Boradcast the messages input by the server administrator.
        参数:
        message - the message to be broadcasted

      • getCurrentTime

        private java.lang.String getCurrentTime()
        Returns the current time in a customized format.
        返回:
        the current time in the "hour:minute:second" format
